column2: "Once ARKS operatives reach a certain level of skill, they are granted approval to use subclasses."
"And it's up to officers like me to determine when they're ready."
"That's because this can be a hindrance rather than a help if the operative isn't ready for it."
"But I digress. The test required for using subclasses consists of defeating a certain number of hostiles."
"Whether or not you take this test is entirely up to you. I'm just here to evaluate your performance."
